about: Dynamic and highly-motivated Full-Stack Developer, forward thinking and adaptable to new technologies with a strong design background and entrepreneurial spirit.
Excellent problem-solving skills with a detail-oriented approach.
Equipped with diverse work experience, ranging from design and development to customer service and sales management.
Adept at leveraging tech proficiency and leadership abilities to drive business growth, client retention, and team success.
Proficient in integrating AI solutions to enhance and innovate across technological domains.

education.title: Certification in Full-Stack Development (C#, React)
details: Intensive 27-week, full-time, in-person bootcamp focused on full-stack development.
Acquired expertise in Git, BASH, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Test-Driven Development, React, C# and .NET.
Create and managed database: MySQL, NoSQL, create web API and Firebase.
Developed applications using ASP.NET, React, Redux and Bootstrap.
Collaborated in teams and practiced pair programming, including two team-week projects.
Enhanced communication and teamwork through daily coding challenges and weekly code review submissions.

education.title: Certification in Front-End Development
details: Completed 60 hours in Front-End development.
Built web applications using HTML, CSS, JQuery, and Bootstrap.

education.title: Bachelor of Design degree, Industrial Design
education.institution: Shenkar College of Engineering and Design
details: Mastered 3D modeling, prototyping, and material utilization.
Applied iterative design methodologies.
Improved visual and graphic design techniques, from sketching to digital rendering.
Participated in a multi-week interdisciplinary product challenge, enhancing collaboration.

experience.title: Studio Manager & Sales Team Leader
experience.company: Santa Fe Spa Center, Santa Fe, NM
details: Led sales and clinic teams.
Drove sales growth and customer satisfaction.
Fostered client relationships for high retention and repeat business.

experience.title: Sales Team Member & Graphic Designer
details: Sold medical-grade skincare products with a focus on relationship building.
Created digital and print marketing materials, including newsletters, banners, ads, brochures, and instructions.

experience.title: Application Designer & Developer
details: Designed and developed a dating app for the gay community with a focus on user safety.
Managed all aspects of app design and production, including UX/UI.
Facilitated meetings with investors and showcased app prototypes to mobile app developers.

experience.title: Transcription Contractor
details: Collaborated with Apple on Siriâ€™s AI language translation in Hebrew.
